message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, but its true worth to you surpasses $1200000. Considering this, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value and ensures you secure an unparalleled asset. I trust that this offer aligns well with your expectations and financial considerations. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the details.
